name: Chocolate Croissant
shortDesc: Warm chocolate filled croissant made with premium Belgian chocolate
fullDesc: Warm chocolate filled croissant made with premium Belgian chocolate and fresh-baked daily. Perfect with your morning coffee or as an afternoon treat. Made with organic butter and hand-rolled for that perfect flaky texture.

name: Butter Croissant
shortDesc: Flaky, buttery croissant made with French-style cultured butter
fullDesc: Flaky, buttery croissant made with French-style cultured butter. Our signature pastry that pairs perfectly with jam or enjoyed plain. Each croissant is hand-rolled and baked to golden perfection for a light, airy texture.

name: Mochi Donuts
shortDesc: Soft and chewy mochi donuts with a variety of flavors
fullDesc: Soft and chewy mochi donuts with a variety of flavors. These unique treats have a satisfying texture that combines the chewiness of mochi with the lightness of a donut. Available in chocolate, ube, matcha, vanilla, and fruity flavors. Gluten-free option available.

name: Sanrio Cookies
shortDesc: Adorable character-shaped cookies that taste as good as they look
fullDesc: Adorable character-shaped cookies that taste as good as they look. Perfect for gifts or as a special treat. Available in Hello Kitty, My Melody, and Cinnamoroll designs. Made with real butter and premium chocolate chips. Each cookie is hand-decorated with care.

name: Strawberry Sponge Cake
shortDesc: Light and airy sponge cake layered with fresh strawberries
fullDesc: Light and airy sponge cake layered with fresh strawberries and whipped cream. A classic dessert that highlights the natural sweetness of seasonal berries. Made with organic eggs and locally sourced strawberries. Perfect for celebrations or as an indulgent treat.

name: Flower Cake Pops
shortDesc: Beautiful edible flowers made from cake pops
fullDesc: Beautiful edible flowers made from cake pops. Each one is hand-decorated and makes for a stunning presentation. Perfect for parties or as a special gift. Available in strawberry, chocolate, and vanilla flavors. Made with real cake and premium frosting.

name: Miffy Bread
shortDesc: Soft and adorable Miffy-shaped bread with a subtle strawberry flavor
fullDesc: Soft and adorable Miffy-shaped bread with a subtle strawberry flavor. These cute breads are fun for kids and adults alike. Made with real strawberry puree and organic flour. Perfect for breakfast or as a snack. Each bun is individually shaped by our bakers.

name: Matcha Latte
shortDesc: Creamy and sweet matcha drink made with premium ceremonial-grade matcha
fullDesc: Creamy and sweet matcha drink made with premium ceremonial-grade matcha. Served hot or iced. Perfect balance of earthy matcha and creamy sweetness. Made with organic milk and sweetened with honey. A perfect pick-me-up any time of day.

name: Strawberry Matcha Latte
shortDesc: Delightful combination of earthy matcha and sweet strawberry
fullDesc: A delightful combination of earthy matcha and sweet strawberry. Layers of flavor that create a unique and refreshing beverage. Served hot or cold. Made with fresh strawberry puree and premium matcha. Topped with a light foam for the perfect finish.
